daily_fact: Today in NYC: The vibrant arts scene continues to thrive as Stages St. Louis announces an exciting lineup for their 2026 season, bringing joy to the community!
topline_md: New York City is bracing for a hybrid storm bringing major coastal flooding, while temperatures are set to drop significantly over the holiday weekend; meanwhile, the city is also addressing public safety concerns with new regulations and initiatives in education, housing, and transportation.

risks_alerts.title: Risks & Alerts
risks_alerts.summary_md:
### Risks & Alerts

- Major coastal flooding expected in NYC due to hybrid storm; prepare for hazardous conditions. [Read](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Expect cold and wet weather for the holiday weekend in NYC and NJ; plan accordingly.
